scripts.build: rm -rf lib && rm -rf dist && rm -rf types && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist && npm run build:deployer
scripts.build:openswap: cd node_modules/@openswap/sdk/ && sed -i "s/\"outputObjects\": \"bytecode\",/\"outputOptions\": {\"txData\":true},/" solidity.config.json && npm run build:contracts && ../../.bin/tsc
scripts.build:product-contract: cd node_modules/@scom/product-master-contract/ && sed -i "s/\"outputObjects\": \"bytecode\"/\"outputOptions\": {\"txData\":true},\"libMap\":{\"@openzeppelin\/contracts\":\"..\/..\/..\/@openzeppelin\/contracts\"}/" solconfig.json && npm run build
scripts.init:product-contract: if [ ! -d node_modules/@scom/product-master-contract/node_modules ] ; then cd node_modules/@scom/product-master-contract && mkdir node_modules && mkdir node_modules/@ijstech && mkdir node_modules/@scom && cd node_modules/@ijstech && ln -s ../../../../@ijstech/cli && ln -s ../../../../@ijstech/compiler && ln -s ../../../../@ijstech/eth-contract && cd ../@scom && ln -s ../../../contract-deployer ; fi
